dmca.title: [ABUSE] copywritten material and illegal content hosted by www.cg-corporation.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, January 04, 2006 9:00 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: The Planet Policy Enforcement
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] copywritten material and illegal content hosted by
www.cg-corporation.com


For your review.

Martin Gaston
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

Begin forwarded message:

> From: "Peter" <peter98@internode.on.net>
> Date: January 4, 2006 7:02:55 AM CST
> To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
> Subject: [ABUSE] copywritten material and illegal content hosted by 
> www.cg-corporation.com
> X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
> X-Spam-Level: ---------------------------------------------------
>
> Hi I believe you host this site.
>
> It has amoung other suspect content a picture of me. The owner of the 
> site has been distributing it and hosting it on his site for some time 
> at http://www.cg-corporation.com/bored/quiet%5e.jpg.
>
> If this is not removed and other illiegal content not investigated 
> immediately i will be contacting the relevant authorities.
>
> Peter.
>
